import { Link } from 'react-router-dom'; const Sidebar = (props) => { const products = props.products; const categories = props.categories; return (

Categories

All {products.length} {categories.map((category, index) => { return ( {category.name} {products.filter(obj => {return obj.category === category.id}).length} )} )}
) } export default Sidebar;
